title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Engineering at full throttle: How AWS powers Formula 1® (SPF108)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 全速工程：AWS如何为一级方程式®提供动力 (SPF108)
abstract: Join F1 Analyst and AWS Motorsports Ambassador Ruth Buscombe as she provides insights into the AWS and F1 partnership, exploring how technology innovations are changing the world of racing and improving the fan experience. Ruth will educate attendees on how AWS powers F1 on and off the track, through F1 Insights, Track Pulse, and more. Stay after the session for a replay of the recent Formula 1 Las Vegas Grand Prix™.
abstract_cn: 加入F1分析师和AWS赛车运动大使Ruth Buscombe，她将深入解析AWS与F1的合作伙伴关系，探索技术创新如何改变赛车世界并提升车迷体验。Ruth将向与会者介绍AWS如何通过F1 Insights、Track Pulse等技术在赛道内外为F1提供支持。会议结束后，请留下观看最近举行的F1拉斯维加斯大奖赛™的重播。

presenter.name: Ruth Buscombe
presenter.title: F1 TV Broadcaster, Race Strategist and AWS Motorsport Ambassador and Technical Advisor
